main.docTitle:
Financial Secretary Incorporated Suspense Account
Resolution of the Legislative Council
main.content: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council under Dependent Territories Regulation 228 on 21 July 1971.

Resolved that this Council approves the establishment of a suspense account, to be known as “The Financial Secretary Incorporated Suspense Account”, which shall be employed to enable the Financial Secretary Incorporated to deal with the regrant or renewal of Government Leases and manage the properties comprised therein and such account shall not at any time be in debt to an amount exceeding $20,000,000.00.

editorialNote.content: This suspense account is deemed to be a special suspense account established in accordance with section 30 of the Public Finance Ordinance (Cap. 2).
